about_the_game:
The digital extras for Yearning: A Gay Story includes the following items:

  • Wallpapers featuring the main cast and the ending CGs
  • The soundtrack, featuring "Yearning", the YAGS theme
  • A behind-the-scenes book, including game tips and tricks, as well as images and writeups from the game development process

This extra content does not impact gameplay in any way. After download, it can be accessed via "Local Files".

content_descriptors.notes: The materials in the digital extras feature shirtless men, men in their underwear, and censored male nudity

This extra content does not impact gameplay in any way. After download, it can be accessed via "Local Files".

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
